website_summaries.verdict: An iconic scent inspired by the unisex fragrance by the same name. So, as you might expect, the scent isn't overly feminine.
pros: Notes of bergamot, cardamom, pineapple, papaya, amber, and green tea
cons: Some reviewers say they need to use an additional anti-perspirant with this product

customer_reviews.title: SOOO TIRED..
customer_reviews.text: THIS STUFF SMELLS LIKE NOTHING. IT MAY WORK BUT WHO CARES. THE COLOGNE IS SO EXPENSIVE. ALTHOUGH THIS REVIEW IS NOT ABOUT THE COLOGNE, ONE WOULD THINK THE DEODORANT WOULD SMELL NICE. NOT. SO TIRED OF READING REVIEWS THAT ARE NOT ACCURATE ON AMAZON. SEND ME A BOTTLE OF THIS CK ONE COLOGNE FAIR IS FAIR.
customer_reviews.author: romysan

customer_reviews.title: Best Deodorant Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have used this deodorant for decades. It smells wonderful, is very effective, and I buy one a year, because it lasts forever, even when I use it multiple times a day during the baking heat of summer in Montana. Best Calvin Klein product sold.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin L. Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: if you like to stink
customer_reviews.text: Terrible deodorant. Doesn't stop the stink. Smells good in the container.
customer_reviews.author: zEPoL

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The title says “SET” and even has a option to get this and a small bottle of ck. Not true! You get one item for around 20 bucks or so. They do have the set for sell for more money. But the add is confusing. Besides that, I love the CK one line. Please note, I layer the product and it lasts all day. Ex. Shower with ck body wash or scent less soap. Use ck lotion and ck deodorant as normal. Spray self with body spray or cologne over lotion!!! (Not to much) if you do this it stays and turns heads. Had strangers touching my arm and laughing at my lame jokes all night. Thanks CK ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Great smell. It is worth the money and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very manly, but yet has a very pleasant , sexy aroma and one deodorant lasts for a very loooong time, so it is also very economical.
customer_reviews.author: Inge B

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorant!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sooo happy someone is still selling these! My favorite deodorant, by far!!! Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Mario B.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Lasts shorter than a typical deodorant brand you uby at the aupermarket for a quarter if the price. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Deo girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: always love and it is the real deal for those wondering
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: The deodorant is great and exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: The deodorant is great and exactly as expected. However the packaging was minimal and the cap was cracked upon delivery. Luckily I had the cap from my old one so that this wouldn't dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Cap is broken! Looks cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This one looks cheaper! Better one available at Macy's. And the cap is broken too! Can't return cause it's a beauty product!
customer_reviews.author: Hisham H

customer_reviews.title: That burning sensation...
customer_reviews.text: I have a multitude of "designer deodorants" and while this has absolutely NO SCENT it caused a reaction on my skin. I've never had this issue with ANY deodorant before however I will never purchase this deodorant again.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: If you wear ckone, wear this
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent especially cause it matches my cologne, only knock is if it's really hot you'll need to reapply but I buy it to match the cologne so I don't have different scents fighting each other.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent, but I've gotten burned by buying fake designer perfume from Amazon before
customer_reviews.author: T. N.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Smells just like the perfume. Seems to last pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Fenstermaker

customer_reviews.title: Using this for years - great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the CK One deodorant for many years, but it is no longer available in stores. Was so glad to find it here. I love the scent, light and fresh, and use this after my last shower of the day. Shipping was fast and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: M. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Nice compliment to the cologne, smells fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and unfortunately have suffered painful reactions to certain brands of deodorant (mostly of the aluminum free or natural varieties from brands I otherwise like). I can't get enough of CK One and wanted to try this deodorant for a little while-so glad I did. Definitely the CK One fragrance I adore but a little lighter/ more subtle, no skin irritation, long lasting (most surprising) and I'm happy with the results and experience of wearing it. Smells fresh and clean which is what I want.
customer_reviews.author: monicaames

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant is completely useless. I've already used half of it until I realized that it is completely useless. It doesn't smell completely like the spray. The scent is not strong at all. I've never realized how underwhelming this deodorant is until I stopped using this and went back to my Old Spice deodorant. It can't even do the one thing that it was intended for: deodorizes.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The scent is fantastic, but it doesn't last all day and it ...
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have noted, there's no antiperspirant here. The scent is fantastic, but it doesn't last all day and it won't stop you from sweating. So it's not really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie M.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It was an excellent choice. The aroma is very pleasant and quite hard after application. If you prefer the spray version, is also a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Pires Castanho Jr

customer_reviews.title: but more like a perfume bar for your under arms
customer_reviews.text: this isn't an antiperspirant, but more like a perfume bar for your under arms. if i'm not trying to sweat i use it over my regular deodorant. its perfect for the summer to wear just buy itself, it makes it smell more like its coming out of your pores. i prefer this to the actual spray perfume.
customer_reviews.author: myatari87

customer_reviews.title: Calvin Klein
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this on my girlfriend. You would actually think someone was wearing perfume not deodorant. If you like CK you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: RDD

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful for the first couple of hours
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of ck one and I was very excited to find this deodorant. I was disappointed. Although it works perfectly for the first couple of hours it doesn't last. The deodorant works but I started feeling 'sticky' which made me paranoid. I spent too much money on it to have that feeling.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyGirl

customer_reviews.title: great.
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for the last few years, no complain, easy to apply. And it smells great too. Can probably get it cheaper when on sale.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAholic

customer_reviews.title: Great product good smell
customer_reviews.text: This is really very good product I really liked it s lot. Only 4 star because I got this for 11.33$ in 2014 and now it’s 20$. Still I got it for 20$
customer_reviews.author: srikanth

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: May not be the product's fault, but I got a bad allergic reaction, including bleeding. While I use and love CK fragrance, this one disagreed with me. Also the product is not clearly advertised - I was looking for a spray and this is a stick. The attitude of the company selling the item (Tuccini) was despicable when I complained. Amazon saved the day and provided a return though.
customer_reviews.author: Laszlo E. Mezny

customer_reviews.title: The Chemist - Terry Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for many years! Just LOVE it:-) Terry/The Chemist!
customer_reviews.author: Teerasak Patamawenu

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting stick!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy one every six months, and use it almost daily. Nice clean scent, effective odor protection that doesn't burn and it lasts and lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: smeells good but its just not an antiperspirant, didn't work for me. surprised since ck has good products maybe I got a defective one
customer_reviews.author: Denisse

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: My father loves this deodorant. I bought as gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: jonandpaty

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I love CK one, but the deodorant is horrible, Sicky, wet & can barely smell the CK One, was really bummed
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's got a great mild smell would. Would buy it again no doubt
customer_reviews.author: Mark flanagan

customer_reviews.title: This is just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Subtle fragrance. Works well. It's hard to find a deodorant stick that doesn't leave underarms sticky. This is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: its fake....
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but, it will not work after 2-3 hours. Is it original ????? I guess no I will not recommend this because it costs more for nothig
customer_reviews.author: Dipali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this deodorant! I have no need for antiperspirant so this product is the answer to my prayers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money the smell is great but it does not last!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lesha

customer_reviews.title: Deodorant only!  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like using antiperspirants . . and this is deodorant only! Great fragrance and very effective deodorant. Hard to find except on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrely

customer_reviews.title: You smell great, but it's just a deodorant
customer_reviews.text: You smell great, but it's just a deodorant, not an antiperspirant. I've noticed that it's best used if I'm not walking a fair distance, because I've noticed moisture. Never good. But I just use it at times when I'm not likely to sweat much and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for guys , girls love the scent..... Just right, not to much
customer_reviews.author: nelson

customer_reviews.title: CK One by Calvin Klein for Men and Women, Deodorant, 2.6 Ounce
customer_reviews.text: This has been my husband's favorite deodorant for years, but it's hard to find locally. It is pricey for a deodorant, but is effective and smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: CK 1 is so clean and fresh smelling
customer_reviews.text: CK 1 is all my husband wears. The deodorant is difficult to find in stores but he likes it because it doesn't clash with his cologne.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Light
customer_reviews.text: I like it, the main punch when taking smell is citrus and sandalwood, but not overbearing. Packaging was a little light so the base of the item was slightly damaged (broken bit of plastic) but it still twists to push up deo, so not really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Ck one
customer_reviews.text: Is a good deodorant. Smells good and is not harsh as many products are. Does not have a long list of additives.
customer_reviews.author: rich whittridge

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: So wonderful !! Smells So Good!! SO GOOD!! So seductive!!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Deoderant but not Anti-Perspirant
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice but I didn't notice this was deodorant only, not anti-perspirant. It was my mistake for ordering as it's clearly stated in the description that it's deodorant only.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Macfarlan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this smell. Seriously, my wife sniffs my underarm.
customer_reviews.author: Nedlab

customer_reviews.title: Good always
customer_reviews.text: Always as it is ~ My husband has been using it for years and I like him using it, too. He says this is better than other deodrants especially the way it keeps him dry.
customer_reviews.author: Liverholic

customer_reviews.title: All-Time Favorite Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I love the ck one fragrance and this is my all-time favorite deodorant. It's not sticky and goes on clear. I'm so glad that Amazon carries it, because it's the deodorant is hard to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 50 cents!  This product will not endure a typical day at the office!
customer_reviews.text: Whatever positive you have read in previous ratings, ignore it! This product does not sustain more than 4 hours of normal office work! I was completely embarrassed when I began to smell the odor emitting from my armpits after lunch! I love the smell of CK One, but the deodorant is a total fail! Thank goodness I had a backup in the car that I was able to put on during my afternoon break. $0.50 is the approximate value of the product.
customer_reviews.author: ÇrÄzï0

customer_reviews.title: For sure!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this CK One deodorant to anyone because it last me for years. I have been using this product probably before yr 2000. It doesn't mark up my clothes, leave any residue and keeps me fresh even throughout my workout.
customer_reviews.author: victoria garcia

customer_reviews.title: ck deodorants
customer_reviews.text: as the ck be deodorant is vanished form the market, I tried this one and for my good surprise, it is very good, I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Thais Waisman

customer_reviews.title: ... hubby wears this product and he always smells so good - even after he goes running
customer_reviews.text: My hubby wears this product and he always smells so good - even after he goes running!
customer_reviews.author: Holly G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years.. together with the CK One Eau de Toilette. People always comment on the nice fragrance even after a long day at work..
customer_reviews.author: M. Bonora

customer_reviews.title: home
customer_reviews.text: too sticky easy sweat not smell good. I and my husband used the DKNA the smell very good and last longer then this one
customer_reviews.author: hong

customer_reviews.title: Fine item
customer_reviews.text: Good item. I give it 4 stars just because its pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Hossein SD

customer_reviews.title: Hated it so much
customer_reviews.text: Hated it so much. I was disgusted by this product and used it to deodorant my feet! I would never purchase this product not even for a dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: initial smell is good but doesnt last more than couple hours
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Arora

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: it is good, but the similarity price and quality, I do not create is for as much and less in this age, but it is taste question, i look people who the scent them special, for my nothing attractive
customer_reviews.author: Luis E. Tellez

customer_reviews.title: The very best!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used any other deodorant product for several years, except for this Calvin Klein product. I do not use a product with an antiperspirant in it because of the studies done on women regarding breast cancer, and this product does an absolutely perfect job! I love the fragrance, the deodorant stick, and the packaging. I have always purchased this product from Amazon, and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Squirrely

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein one Deodorant, 2.6 oz
product_meta.description: Purity. Unity. Fresh. The revolutionary first ck fragrance is designed for men and women to share. Top Notes: pineapple, green notes, mandarin orange, papaya, bergamot, cardamom and lemon Heart Notes: nutmeg, violet, orris root, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley and rose Base Notes: sandalwood, amber, musk, cedar and oakmoss.Note:- grey can appear to have a hue of blue. Light grey can sometimes print slightly blue.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
